scripts.copy:static: mkdir -p dist/assets && cp public/index.html dist/index.html && (cp public/favicon.svg dist/favicon.svg 2>/dev/null || true) && (cp -R public/assets dist/ 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/assets && esbuild src/main.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --outfile=dist/assets/bundle.js && cp public/index.html dist/index.html && (cp public/favicon.svg dist/favicon.svg 2>/dev/null || true) && (cp -R public/assets dist/ 2>/dev/null || true) && touch dist/.nojekyll
